text: Neveruyushchiye govoryat, chto Koran - poeziya i chto Mukhammad - poet. Allakh razoblachil ikh lozh'. Ved' Koran soderzhit mudrost', pritchi, nazidaniya, nastavleniya, zakony. Stil' Korana otlichayetsya ot poeticheskogo stilya, osnovannogo na vymysle, mechtaniyakh i obmane. Allakh raz"yasnil, chto Mukhammad - da blagoslovit yego Allakh i privetstvuyet! - otlichayetsya ot poetov. Ved' on izrekayet pouchitel'nyye nazidaniya i mudrost', a v ikh slovakh vymysel i obman. Takovo bol'shinstvo poetov
